name: dlv
description: Safely get a dot-notated property within an object.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run -s build:cjs && npm run -s build:umd
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jason Miller <jason@developit.ca> (http://jasonformat.com)
